result.summary_1_page: The iPhone 15 Pro transitions to a titanium frame, reducing weight by 19g while maintaining durability. All 9 sources highlight the A17 Pro chip's leading performance, with sustained gaming noted by GSMArena and NotebookCheck. The 48MP main camera receives universal acclaim, scoring 154 on DXOMark, though low-light performance trails some rivals. Battery life sees modest gains (10%) with 14.5h active use, but 20W charging remains a consistent criticism. USB-C adoption is welcomed but limited to USB 2.0 speeds on base models. iOS 17 features are praised, though Android-first features like RCS are noted as overdue.
pros: Titanium frame reduces weight significantly (GSMArena, PhoneArena, Tom's Guide)
A17 Pro delivers exceptional sustained performance (NotebookCheck, GSMArena, TechRadar)
48MP main camera with excellent Portrait mode (DXOMark score 154, praised by 8 sources)
USB-C finally adopted (universal praise across reviews)
7 years of software support (Apple confirmation cited by all)
cons: 20W charging remains slow vs competition (criticized by all 9 sources)
USB 2.0 speeds on base model is disappointing (The Verge, Android Authority, Tom's Guide)
Price increase in most markets (mentioned by 6 sources)
No charger in box continues (universal complaint)

attributes.name: Camera
attributes.explanation: DXOMark 154 (top 10 globally). GSMArena and PhoneArena praise 24MP default mode. Minor low-light weakness vs S24 Ultra noted by 3 sources. Video quality exceptional (Tom's Guide, TechRadar).

attributes.name: Battery Endurance
attributes.explanation: GSMArena measured 86h endurance rating. 20W charging criticized universally. NotebookCheck notes 14.5h active use, efficiency from 3nm chip helps.

attributes.name: Performance
attributes.explanation: A17 Pro leads in sustained performance per NotebookCheck thermal testing. Geekbench 7200 multi-core. Ray tracing enabled for gaming (TechRadar, Android Central).

attributes.name: Display
attributes.explanation: ProMotion 120Hz, 2000 nits peak. DisplayMate A+ rating. PWM-free at high brightness. Thinner bezels praised (PhoneArena, GSMArena).

attributes.name: Software Experience
attributes.explanation: iOS 17 praised for StandBy and interactive widgets. 7 years updates confirmed. Minor bugs in initial release noted by 2 sources (Android Authority, Tom's Guide).

attributes.name: Design & Build
attributes.explanation: Titanium praised universally. Action button well-received. 19g lighter than 14 Pro. IP68 rating maintained (NotebookCheck, DXOMark).

attributes.name: Longevity Value
attributes.explanation: 7-year support class-leading. High resale value historically. Price increase hurts value proposition (Android Central, TechRadar).
